venue.address_1: Framingham Centre Common Historic District, Framingham, MA 01702
venue.name: Framingham Centre Common Historic District, Framingham, MA 01702

item.description:
Looking for some great deals on baby and children's clothes, books, toys, games, or other equipment? Come to the Mothers & More yard sale on Saturday, June 4, from 9:00-12:00 on the Framingham Centre Common (click here for a map).  

There will be over a dozen members there selling baby & kid stuff and other household items. It's a great low pressure way to learn a little more about the group and bring home something new.  Refreshments available too!

The raindate is Sat 6/11, same time.  But we're thinking sun! :)  Hope to see you there.
item.name: 3rd Annual Mothers & More Yard Sale
